summary: Panasonic is a Japanese company that makes electronics and other products. It started in 1918 as a small business making electrical items and grew into a big, global company. Over time, it changed its name from Matsushita Electric to Panasonic. Today, Panasonic makes many things, like batteries, car parts, and home renovation items. It is one of the largest companies listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and is known for its high-quality products.
title: Panasonic
